poem:
"An Ode to Super Gran"

In past plaid and speckled specks, a formidable Gran ascends,
Beyond the mortal coil, aged ninety-eight, this tale ends.
Through Glaswegian roots and Edinburgh arts, she thrived,
On kiddie screens, in plucky roles, her spirit alive.
Gudrun Ure, heroine, in ITV's fantasy lands,
A final curtain, at peace, in London's gentle hands.
